description: Lists all, or filtered by resource name, migration tasks associated with the user account making this call. This API has the following traits:

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more migration tasks than the max result, return the next token to be passed to the next call as a bookmark of where to start from.

nested_items.name: MigrationTaskSummaryList
nested_items.description: Lists the migration task's summary which includes: MigrationTaskName, ProgressPercent, ProgressUpdateStream, Status, and the UpdateDateTime for each task.

nested_items.name: ProgressUpdateStream
nested_items.description: An AWS resource used for access control. It should uniquely identify the migration tool as it is used for all updates made by the tool.

nested_items.name: MigrationTaskName
nested_items.description: Unique identifier that references the migration task. Do not store personal data in this field.

nested_items.name: ProgressPercent
nested_items.description: Indication of the percentage completion of the task.

nested_items.name: StatusDetail
nested_items.description: Detail information of what is being done within the overall status state.

nested_items.name: UpdateDateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the task was gathered.
